page.title: 04EMPLOYMENT IN LOCHFOOT
page.content: THE PATTERN OF EMPLOYMENT IN LOCHFOOT HAS REMAINED ALMOST UNCHANGED IN RECENT YEARS.THERE ARE 86 PEOPLE WORKING AND 1 UNEMPLOYED,(1.2% UNEMPLOYED COMPARED WITH 10.8% IN DUMFRIES,THE NEAREST TOWN.)OF THE 86,58 ARE MALE AND 28 FEMALE,4 MEN AND 2 WOMEN BEING IN PROFESSION.FARMING IS THE MAIN INDUSTRY WITH 17 FARMERS AND 5 FARMWORKERS.I.C.I AT CARGENBRIDGE WHICH MANUFACTURES PLASTIC FILM EMPLOYS 5 OF THE 86 AND THE LOCAL PLUMBING FIRM ANOTHER 5.THE LOCAL HAULAGE CONTRACTOR EMPLOYS 3 OF THE 86 AND THE LOCAL BUS HIRER 2.TWO LOCAL MEN WORK AT LOCHFOOT WATERWORKS .THE VILLAGE HAS ITS OWN CABINET MAKER, BRICK-LAYER AND DIGGER OPERATOR.THE REMAINDER WORK IN AND AROUND DUMFRIES.28 ARE SELF EMPLOYED AND ONE WORKS UNDER THE GOVERNMENT YOUTH TRAINING SCHEME.
